verbose_text: 42 MDD diagnostic criteria include two or more weeks of decreased mood or markedly diminished interest or pleasure in most activities combined with one or more of the following criteria : severe change in appetite and sleeping habits, psychomotor agitation or retardation, excessive guilt, diminished concentration, or recurrent thoughts of death.
evidence: MDD diagnostic criteria include two or more weeks of decreased mood or markedly diminished interest or pleasure in most activities combined with one or more of the following criteria: severe change in appetite and sleeping habits, psychomotor agitation or retardation, excessive guilt, diminished concentration, or recurrent thoughts of death
